title.en: Doctoral Seminar in Zoology and Ecology

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en:
Graduate students regularly attend seminars of zoology according to the schedule announced in the beginning of each term (12 credits, 1,5 credit per term). Students participate in other seminars, and domestic workshops, 
related to their speciality (up to 6 credits, receiving 0,2 credit for attendance and 0,8 credits for a talk). Students actively seek for possibilities to attend inernational meetings (meetings of regional importance: 1,5 credit for poster presentation, 3 credits for oral presentation; international conferences: 2 credit for poster presentation, 4 credits for oral presentation). Up to 3 credits may be obtained for efforts in popularizing science.
description.et:
Doktorandid osalevad regulaarselt õppetooli seminaridel vastavalt iga semestri alguses kehtestatavale seminariplaanile  (12 EAP, 1,5 EAP semestris). Doktorandid osalevad muudel valitud erialga seotud seminaridel ja teistel 
Eesti-sisestel teadusüritustel (kuni 6 EAP, arvestusega 0,2 EAP kuulajana osalemise eest ning kuni 0,8 EAP ettekande eest). Doktorandid otsivad aktiivselt võimalusi rahvusvahelistel teadusüritustel osalemiseks (regionaalse tähtsusega üritusel 1,5 EAP stendiettekande eest, 3 EAP suulise ettekande eest; rahvusvahelisel konverentsil 2 EAP stendiettekande eest 
ning 4 EAP suulise ettekande eest). Arvestatakse ka eriala 
populariseerimisega seotud tegevust (kuni 3 EAP).

objectives.en: Training graduate students in reporting research results, as well as developing skills of public presentation and academic disputation.
objectives.et: Doktorantidele erialase ettekande ettevalmistamise õpetamine, esinemiskogemuse ja teaduslikus väitluses osalemise vilumuse andmine

learning_outcomes.en: PhD student who had succesfully completed the course:
-has the overview of new developments and results of research in his/her field of study
learning_outcomes.et: - omab ülevaadet oma eriala uuematest uurimissuundadest ja teadustulemustest,

learning_outcomes.en: -is able to evaluate critically and argue about results of research in his/her field of study
learning_outcomes.et: - suudab kriitiliselt hinnata ja diskuteerida oma uurimissuuna teadustulemuste üle,

learning_outcomes.en: -is able to use scientific language used in a special field
-is capable of making and performing internationally accepted scientific presentation
learning_outcomes.et: - on võimeline koostama ja esitama rahvusvahelisel tasemel teadusettekannet,

learning_outcomes.en: -has public speaking skills and uses modern presentation technics
learning_outcomes.et: - omab piisavaid esinemisoskuseid ja kasutab kaasaegset esitlustehnikat,

learning_outcomes.en: -is able to present his/her results of study to the public
learning_outcomes.et: - suudab tutvustada oma teadustulemusi laiemale avalikkusele.
